Readonly m

m: number

Protected v

v: number[]

Accessors

array

  • get array(): any[]

  • Return a copy of the underlaying array (flatten components). If the matrix is symmetric, a compress array is returned.

    Returns any[]

isSymmetric

  • get isSymmetric(): boolean

  • Returns boolean

length

  • get length(): number

  • Returns number
